content.rendered:
The stay-at-home dad finally finds some “me time” for the first time in many years when his wife and children go away. He contacts his former best friend, but the wild weekend they spent together almost turns his life upside down.

Directed By John Hamburg

Written By John Hamburg

Stars: Kevin Hart. Mark Wahlberg. Regina Hall
